Dialogue.Page: A temperate world, with obvious signs of inhabitation.
Many beings have gathered here, for what purpose is unknown to me at this time.

(Install <color="purple">Jam Hub</color> to learn more about this world!)
A temperate world, with obvious signs of inhabitation.
Many beings have gathered here, for what purpose is unknown to me at this time.
My Hearthian friend has told me that the being gathered here are known as "modders".
I have invited one to visit my ship, as I am entirely unable to grasp what exactly a "mod" is.
Unfortunately, I have not yet gleaned any useful info. This particular individual claims to have created the "mod" displayed here, whatever that means.
